note.p: Draper. Born in Whitchurch, Shropshire. Lived and worked in Shrewsbury.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1872/22/1), 1871 (RG10/2772/35/24)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 May 2015)
